metadata.synopsis: This goblin is watching his boss in awe and doesn't want to be sisturbed. When he speaks, he does so in hushed tones.

0.speaker: Warrior Huk
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: He waves you off, while he keeps looking at the goblin boss.

1.speaker: Warrior Huk
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin looks from the goblin boss, to the player and back to the goblin boss, gesturing towards him.
